module.name: Time Conditions
module.description: Creates a condition where calls will go to one of two destinations (eg, an extension, IVR, ring group..) based on the time and/or date. This can be used for example to ring a receptionist during the day, or go directly to an IVR at night.
module.changelog: *13.0.17* Add new time groups from time conditions *13.0.16* FREEPBX-11605 figure out the highest number not the last number when adding an index *13.0.15* FREEPBX-11344 Fix delete url on timeconditions grid *13.0.14* Floating bootnav clock issues *13.0.13* Use moments to accurately display time *13.0.12* FREEPBX-10658 FREEPBX-10800 *13.0.11.1* Typo in url *13.0.11* Move grid to ajax, Add slideout menu *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10330 Fix adding group on update *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10163 FREEPBX-10184 fix javascript for form validation. *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10163 Time group with an apostrophe in its description does not get saved *13.0.7* Language prompt updates *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10089 fix javascript for timegroups *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9823 including comments, FREEPBX-9824, Fix time formatting in timegroups, small cleanup *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9702 Not possible configure days less than 10 *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9598 Set default timezone *13.0.2* FREEPBX-9039 Remove Departments from FreePBX, Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for timeconditions *13.0.1* FREEPBX-8689 *13.0.1alpha2* Fix toggle all feature code to set states properly. *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.6* FREEPBX-7997 Systems with /var and /tmp on different partitions cause problems. Use Asterisk's temporary directory instead. *12.0.5* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *12.0.4* Spelling Fixes *12.0.3* Part fix for #6923 language not being set. *12.0.2* FREEPBX-7166 check destinations bug *12.0.1* FREEPBX-6415 Password and Invert BLF Abilities *2.11.0.6* Update license *2.11.0.5* Add toggle all feature code *2.11.0.4* Database Abstraction Layer Changes *2.11.0.2* FREEPBX-5982 Update Feature Code Admin Descriptions when Time Conditions Changes *2.11.0.1* syntax error *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.2* #5476, #5478 *2.10.0.1* misc bugs *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.7* #5175, #5176 *2.9.0.6* #5030, spelling errors *2.9.0.5* #4725 *2.9.0.4* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.3* #4651, #4655 *2.9.0.2* #4636 sticky override added *2.9.0.1* #4636 typo broke hints, broken destination *2.9.0.0* #4636 Add Auto-resetting manual override
